apps.localizedDescription: Develop your skills, try to survive as much as you can, and become the biggest snake. You start as a small snake, get bigger by eating other snakes who try to do the same. You have to attack wisely but defend skillfully. How long can you survive?
apps.name: Snake.io+
apps.subtitle: Fun Battle Royale Arcade Game
apps.versionDescription:
* New integration of Game Center: Access Point, Leaderboard, and Achievements

* New Monthly Live Events

* Updated Daily Challenge Skin Algorithm

* Improved controller support and targeted tutorials

* Improved user experience for UI functionality and visibility

* Optimized Snake Movement, “Wiggle” Animation

* Bug fixes for Live Event UI

* Bug fixes for boost button functionality

* Bug fixes for No Internet in Classic Leaderboard

apps.localizedDescription: Embark on a cozy adventure with Hello Kitty and Friends and restore an abandoned island to its former glory. Can you solve the mystery hidden within?
apps.name: Hello Kitty Island Adventure
apps.subtitle: Island adventures await
apps.versionDescription:
It’s time for the biggest event of the year! Hello Kitty’s 50th anniversary is here, and she can’t wait for you to join her for this show-stopping celebration.


Join Hello Kitty and Friends for a mega-bash highlighting the sweet past and shining future of everybody’s favorite friend: Hello Kitty!


Celebrate with new outfits, foods, and furniture galore during this once-in-a-lifetime event. Plus, plan a secret surprise party with all her friends to give Hello Kitty the best supercute birthday ever!


- Pop iridescent Bubbles around the Plaza and Resort Shops to use throughout the event

- Collect the Commemorative Bow each day in the plaza for retro rewards

- Trade your Bubbles and Bows for an abundance of new delights—avatar palettes, furniture, decorations, and more!

- Hunt down collectible cards around the island to commemorate 50 years of fabulous looks

- Discover new recipes with Bubbles—who knows what you’ll create!

- Bring beautiful magic to your gardens with a Hello Kitty-inspired flower and brand-new effect

- Play an epic four-part quest to plan Hello Kitty’s surprise birthday party with My Melody! The fun begins October 26th

apps.localizedDescription: Craft your perfect defense from a combination of powerful Monkey Towers and awesome Heroes, then pop every last invading Bloon!
apps.name: Bloons TD 6+
apps.subtitle: Mega Popular Tower Defense.
apps.versionDescription:
Burning Hot Boss Update! - Minor bug fixes


• Blastapopoulos returns! The Demon of the Core brings fire and fury to Boss Events.

• New Advanced map to switch things up, Ancient Portal.

• Plus New Quests, Balance Changes, QoL improvements, Trophy Store cosmetics, and more!

apps.localizedDescription: Start your NBA journey from a young rookie to an NBA legend. Create your player and choose physical characteristics like height, wingspan, weight, playstyle, & more. Choose your position and play on your favorite NBA team.
apps.name: NBA 2K25: Arcade Edition
apps.subtitle: Run the neighbourhood
apps.versionDescription: Legends are made in NBA 2K25 Arcade Edition as The Neighborhood debuts on iOS. Explore your MyPLAYER’s immersive new home, discover exciting new quests by interacting with your neighbors, and shop for new unique gear, updated throughout the year. Challenge Game Center friends to ranked online matches, and connect with the league’s biggest stars.

apps.localizedDescription:
Start your reactors and clean out your vents! Among Us has crash-landed in Crossy Road Castle!


Bring your friends and see how far you can get in this endless spinning tower of arcade fun!


Keep climbing as high as you can. Every run is different.
apps.name: Crossy Road Castle
apps.subtitle: Endless co-op action fun
apps.versionDescription:
- Challenge Events bug fixes and improvements

- We've hidden more eggs in preparation for the return of "The Great Easter Egg Hunt"
